# [Interview #473: TGS Signing Report - Freelancer, Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=473#8)

#### Question

Has Narishma fulfilled the prophecy regarding
*Callandor*
and "who draws it out shall follow after"?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
